item.description:
If it's a little too crazy out there on St Paddy's Day for you, why not join us the day after at McLaddens in West Hartford for a bit of Irish???

A Traditional Irish Pub

McLadden's Irish Publick House promises true Irish warmth and hospitality. This cozy, traditional Irish pub & restaurant is a destination spot in West Hartford Center for those seeking a comfortable, laid back alternative to the glitzy martini bars and trendy modern establishments that dominate today's restaurant landscape. Come for the authentic Irish beers, come for delicious comfort food, come share a great time with friends. 


Comfort Food With Pizzazz 

At McLadden's Irish Publick House they recognize that sometimes you are just looking for a tasty dish served in a comfortable atmosphere at a price that won't blow the bank. The menu offers dishes that cater to a wide range of taste buds. Check out this menu:

http://www.mcladdens.com/dinner/dinner.htm

 

* BTW...there is a live band playing that evening...Mystic Bowie Reggae Band! Starts at 10pm, so if you don't want to dine with us...come later to hear the band! 

change
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup sign...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: The "Day After" St Patrick's Day Dinner @ McLaddens in West Hartford!!!
